column4: tryin to install php5 on ubuntu, I apt-get installed phpd but phpinfo still tells me that 4.4.0-3ubuntu2, is this an apache problem or did I miss something in php5?
restarted apache, but didnt uninstall php4
remove wont get rid of all php4 packages will it?
gotta love that, removed php4, and phpinfo still says 4.4.0-3ubuntu2
so you did apache -k restart or apache2 -k restart
apache -k restart should be all you need :)
try it to see, alot easier than remembering the path
and apache -k restart, stop or start gives me a help menu
you should probably run apache2 over apache anyway, since it's newer and all
